trans-unit.source: Represents the exception thrown when a component cannot be granted a license.
trans-unit.target: Representerer unntak når en komponent ikke kan få en lisens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method throws LicenseException when a component cannot obtain a valid license.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden oppstår LicenseException når en komponent ikke kan hente en gyldig lisens.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This occurs when a component is either not licensed, or is licensed but cannot be granted a valid license.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer når en komponent ikke er enten lisensiert, eller er lisensiert, men kan ikke få en gyldig lisens.

trans-unit.source: For more information on licensing, see [How to: License Components and Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om lisensiering [slik: lisens komponenter og kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref> class for the type of component that was denied a license.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"> </xref> klasse komponenttypen som ble avslått en lisens.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer komponenttypen ikke fikk lisens.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref> class with the given <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"> </xref> klasse med den angitte <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> og <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to be used for deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> som skal brukes for deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: The destination to be used for deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Målet som skal brukes for deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref> class for the type and the instance of the component that was denied a license.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"> </xref> klasse hvilken og forekomsten av komponenten som ble avslått en lisens.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer komponenttypen ikke fikk lisens.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The instance of the component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: Forekomsten av komponenten som ikke fikk lisens.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref> class for the type and the instance of the component that was denied a license, along with a message to display.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"> </xref> klasse hvilken og forekomsten av komponenten som ble avslått en lisens, og en melding som vises.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer komponenttypen ikke fikk lisens.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The instance of the component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: Forekomsten av komponenten som ikke fikk lisens.

trans-unit.source: The exception message to display.
trans-unit.target: Unntaksmelding skal vises.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref> class for the type and the instance of the component that was denied a license, along with a message to display and the original exception thrown.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"> </xref> klasse hvilken og forekomsten av komponenten som ble avslått en lisens, sammen med en melding som vises, og det opprinnelige det oppstod et unntaket.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer komponenttypen ikke fikk lisens.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The instance of the component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: Forekomsten av komponenten som ikke fikk lisens.

trans-unit.source: The exception message to display.
trans-unit.target: Unntaksmelding skal vises.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that represents the original exception.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Exception>som representerer det opprinnelige unntaket.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> med informasjon om unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to be used for deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> som skal brukes for deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: The destination to be used for deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Målet som skal brukes for deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: Henter komponenttypen ikke fikk lisens.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer komponenttypen ikke fikk lisens.</xref:System.Type>
